snippet: No infraction is too small to escape the notice of the Yongshan Persuaders, one of many groups of older residents who use their free time to patrol the city.
abstract: Yongshan Persuaders, volunteer group made up of older Chinese retirees, patrol Fengtai neighborhood of Beijing looking for variety of infractions against public order; group is one of several in city, and members are viewed alternately as busybodies or as do-gooders who are intent on giving back to society in their retirement.
lead_paragraph: No infraction is too small to escape the notice of the Yongshan Persuaders, one of many groups of older residents who use their free time to patrol the city.

headline.print_headline: No Infraction Is Too Small for Beijing’s Persuaders
headline.main: Beijing Retirees Looking to Keep Active Volunteer to Walk the Beat
